ns2:test-suite.name: User should be asked personal info before redirecting to the agent

test-case.name: Verify if user is able to communicate with agent after providing info details
test-case.title: Verify if user is able to communicate with agent after providing info details

step.name: Given I login as agent of General Bank Demo
step.title: Given I login as agent of General Bank Demo

step.name: Given User select General Bank Demo tenant without creating profile
step.title: Given User select General Bank Demo tenant without creating profile

step.name: And Click chat icon
step.title: And Click chat icon

step.name: When User enter chat to agent into widget input field
step.title: When User enter chat to agent into widget input field

step.name: Then Card with a Let me connect you with a live agent to assist you further. Before I transfer you, please give us some basic info: text is shown on user chat to agent message
step.title: Then Card with a Let me connect you with a live agent to assist you further. Before I transfer you, please give us some basic info: text is shown on user chat to agent message

step.name: And User is able to provide some info about himself in the card after his chat to agent message
step.title: And User is able to provide some info about himself in the card after his chat to agent message

step.name: And User click 'Submit' button in the card after user message: chat to agent
step.title: And User click 'Submit' button in the card after user message: chat to agent

step.name: Then Agent has new conversation request
step.title: Then Agent has new conversation request

step.name: When Agent click on new conversation request from touch
step.title: When Agent click on new conversation request from touch

step.name: Then Conversation area becomes active with chat to agent user's message
step.title: Then Conversation area becomes active with chat to agent user's message

step.name: And Conversation area contains personal info as user's message
step.title: And Conversation area contains personal info as user's message

step.name: When Agent responds with hello to User
step.title: When Agent responds with hello to User

step.name: Then User should see 'hello' text response for his 'personal info' input
step.title: Then User should see 'hello' text response for his 'personal info' input

label.name: story
label.value: Verify if user is able to communicate with agent after providing info details

label.name: feature
label.value: User should be asked personal info before redirecting to the agent
